title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running LLMs locally with a built-in model registry; supports macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API; works in Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama HTTP API with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to plug Ollama models into chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-user, model manager, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Micronaut & Spring Boot integrations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and file-based prompt runner for Ollama with history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and RAG.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package wrapping the Ollama HTTP API for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-python PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Python integration with Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images for CPU and GPU (CUDA/ROCm) inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for the Ollama API with Tokio streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized models for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.
